headline: Marriott International President and Chief Executive Officer, and Executive Vice President and Chief Revenue & Technology Officer to Speak at the J.P. Morgan Gaming, Lodging, Restaurant & Leisure Management Access Forum on March 12; Remarks to be Webcast
summary: Marriott International, Inc.'s (Nasdaq: MAR) President and Chief Executive Officer, Anthony Capuano, and Executive Vice President and Chief Revenue & Technology Officer, Drew Pinto, will speak at the J.P. Morgan Gaming, Lodging, Restaurant & Leisure Management Access Forum, to be held on Thursday, March 12, in Las Vegas, NV. Mr. Capuano and Mr. Pinto's remarks will be at approximately 11:00 a.m., Eastern Time, and will be webcast live.
